examples: they gave us the O.K. to go ahead
I approve of his educational policies

definitions.text: being satisfactory or in satisfactory condition
examples: the passengers were shaken up but are all right
dinner and the movies had been fine
another minute I'd have been fine

definitions.text: in a satisfactory or adequate manner; ; ; (`alright' is a nonstandard variant of `all right')
examples: she'll do okay on her own
held up all right under pressure
